docs.text: Overview HUC-DB is a large relational database including multiple tables with information. This database will serve as a novel collection of tactics of legal repression and legal mobilization in authoritarian contexts. It will also provide a blueprint for collection of state-movement discursive contentions informing oppositional identity formation in periods of social upheaval. Structure Compressed Full The database encompasses the following tables: CourtCase Offender EducationLevel FinalDecision Disenter Organization Affiliation PoliticalOffence PoliceStation Lawyer PoliceOfficer LegalMovilization LegalRepression
